What Platforms Will Baldur's Gate 3 Be On?

Baldur's Gate 3 is released on PC and PlayStation 5. In the final Panel from Hell stream hosted by Larian Studios CEO Swen Vincke, it was revealed that the game is being optimized for additional current-gen platforms, but did not specify which ones. Although the game will be released on multiple platforms, crossplay will not be available for Baldur's Gate 3.
